title: Introducing Else If Statements
content: If you have multiple onditions that need to be addressed, you can chain if statements together with else if statements.

exercises.instruction: Convert the logic to use else if statements

hint: You should have at least two else statements
You should have at least two if statements
You should have closing and opening curly braces for each else if code block.
testElseIf(0) should return the string 'Smaller than 5'
testElseIf(5) should return the string 'Between 5 and 10'
testElseIf(7) should return the string 'Between 5 and 10'
testElseIf(10) should return the string 'Between 5 and 10'
testElseIf(12) should return the string 'Greater than 10'
